articles.title: Kim Jong Il Meets Those Who Contributed to Successful Satellite Launch
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Meets Those Who Contributed to Successful Satellite Launch
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il met the scientists, technicians, workers and officials who contributed to the successful launch of the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 and posed for a photograph with them.
					 He acknowledged the enthusiastic cheers of the scientists, technicians, workers and officials and extended warm greetings to them.
					
					 He warmly congratulated them on making a great contribution to the launch of the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 by devoting all their wisdom and enthusiasm with ardent patriotism and posed for a photograph with them.
					
					 He said that the successful launch of the satellite, an aggregate of science and technology, marked a national auspicious event which powerfully demonstrated before the world the dignity and invincible national power of Songun Korea and the inexhaustible mental power of the Korean people and a historic event which signified the first gun salute heralding the victory in the great struggle to build a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and conviction that the scientists and technicians would live up to the trust and expectation of the Party with greater scientific and technological achievements by studying and introducing valuable science and technology conducive to building an economic power, bearing deep in mind the mission of the times that they are soldiers standing at the outposts for opening the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Accompanying him were Minister of the People's Armed Forces Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK,Chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army Ri Yong Ho, and Secretary of the WPK Central Committee Jon Pyong Ho, First Vice-Director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA Kim Jong Gak and First Vice-Minister of the People's Armed Forces Kim Il Chol who are members of the NDC of the DPRK.

articles.title: Foreign Ministry Spokesman on Russian FM's Visit to DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Spokesman on Russian FM's Visit to DPRK
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA Friday as regards the Russian foreign minister's visit to the DPRK:
					 The Russian foreign minister and his party visited the DPRK on April 23 and 24 as part of exchanges for significantly marking this year in which falls the 60th anniversary of the conclusion of agreement on economic and cultural cooperation between the DPRK and Russia under the agreement reached between the two ministries toward the end of last year.
					
					 During his visit the Russian foreign minister paid a courtesy call on the president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and had talks with the DPRK foreign minister.
					
					 The talks and meetings dealt with the matters on boosting the traditional, friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries, and agreement was reached there.
					
					 Also discussed at the talks was the prevailing situation after the release of the UN Security Council's "presidential statement" critical of the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					 Both sides recognized that satellite launch is a sovereign right of each country.
					
					 The Russian side reconfirmed its stand on the UN sanctions against the DPRK and paid attention to the DPRK's stand that there is no need to hold the six-party talks any longer.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Russian FM
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Russian FM
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday met and had a friendly talk with Sergei Viktorovich Lavrov, foreign minister of the Russian Federation who paid a courtesy call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.
					 On hand were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, and Valery Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Personal Letter to Kim Jong Il from Russian President
articles.content:
Personal Letter to Kim Jong Il from Russian President
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a personal letter from Russian President Dmitri Anatolievich Medvedev.
					 The letter was conveyed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, on April 24 by Sergei Viktorovich Lavrov, foreign minister of Russia, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian FM
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian FM
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Sergei Viktorovich Lavrov, foreign minister of the Russian Federation, on a visit to the DPRK. 
					 It was conveyed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, by the Russian foreign minister Friday.

articles.title: DPRK Government Gives Reception for Russian FM
articles.content:
DPRK Government Gives Reception for Russian FM
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government gave a reception for the visiting foreign minister of Russia at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on April 23.
					 Present there on invitation were Sergei Viktorovich Lavrov, foreign minister of the Russian Federation, and his party and Valery Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun and officials concerned were present there.
					
					  Pak Ui Chun said in his speech at the reception that the Russian people are making efforts to maintain the overall stability of the country and its economic development and raise its international position despite the worldwide financial crisis.
					
					 We will defend peace and security of the Korean Peninsula with the might of Songun in a responsible manner, he stressed.
					
					 He expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Russia would grow strong in the spirit of the joint documents signed by the top leaders of the two countries and the treaty concluded between the two states.
					
					The Russian foreign minister in his speech extended congratulations to General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his reelection as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK at the First Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly.
					
					 The firm stand of the Russian Federation to develop the relations with the DPRK is reflected in the treaty of friendship, good neighborliness and cooperation between the two countries signed in 2000, he noted.
					
					 The joint documents signed by the top leaders of the two countries have put spurs to the development of the Russia-DPRK relations, he said, wishing the Korean people fresh progress.

articles.title: National Meeting Held to Celebrate 77th Birthday of KPA
articles.content:
National Meeting Held to Celebrate 77th Birthday of KPA
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the April 25 House of Culture on Friday to celebrate the 77th anniversary of the founding of the Korean People's Army.
					 Present there were senior party, army and state officials, chairpersons of friendly parties and officials of Party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the KPA, officials of scientific, educational, cultural and arts, public health and media organs, families of KPA servicepersons, persons who have distinguished themselves in assisting the army, working people in Pyongyang, compatriots overseas and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys of different countries and members of the military attaches corps here.
					
					 KPA General Ri Yong Ho, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, delivered a report.
					
					 He said that the founding of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army by President Kim Il Sung on April 25, Juche 21 (1932) marked the beginning of a new history of the Korean revolution which was started and has victoriously advanced with arms, adding that the revolutionary armed forces of Korea defeated the aggression forces of two imperialisms and emerged victorious in the past anti-Japanese revolutionary war and the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The People's Army has grown strong to be a-match-for-a hundred revolutionary armed forces under the wise guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea and the leader. It has resolutely defended the security of the country and socialist gains and firmly guaranteed the victorious advance of the revolutionary cause of Juche with arms while frustrating every move of the U.S. imperialists and their stooges to provoke a war, standing on the forefront of the anti-imperialist military front. 
					
					 The Songun politics being pursued by the WPK is the politics which calls for regarding the military affairs as the most important state affair and carrying out all work related to the revolution and construction in a revolutionary and militant manner with the People's Army as a core and main force. Herein lie the originality of the politics and its invincible might.
					
					 The KPA has grown to be powerful revolutionary armed forces with modern offensive and defensive means capable of beating back any enemy's armed invasion at a single blow, winning miraculous victories in the fierce anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. confrontation. As a result, the DPRK is displaying its might as a world military power possessed of war deterrence for self-defence. This is the precious fruition of the outstanding and tested leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The reporter underscored the need for all the party members, servicepersons and people to protect Kim Jong Il politically and ideologically with their lives in any adversity and consolidate the single-minded unity of the Party, the army and the people around the headquarters of the revolution as firm as a rock. 
					
					 He called on all the servicepersons to thoroughly establish a revolutionary commanding system and military discipline whereby they act as one according to the orders and instructions of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He underscored the need to continue channeling great efforts into the development of the national defence industry as required by the line of socialist economic construction in the Songun era on the principle of giving priority to the military affairs and put the process of modernizing the entire army and arming all the people at a higher level and turn the whole country into an impregnable fortress.
					
					 The reporter declared that the DPRK would bolster its war deterrent and take stronger counter-measures to protect the dignity of the country and the nation's right to existence under the situation where the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppets are persisting in their hostile policies toward the DPRK and moves for aggression against it. 
					
					 Should the U.S. bellicose forces and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors dare ignite a war of aggression despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK, the KPA and people will respond to it with a decisive and merciless just great war for reunification and wipe out the aggressors to the last man by fully mobilizing all their military potentials and thus accomplish the historic cause of national reunification without fail.

articles.title: KPA Song and Dance Ensemble Gives Performance
articles.content:
KPA Song and Dance Ensemble Gives Performance
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- A music and dance performance was given by the Korean People's Army Song and Dance Ensemble at the April 25 House of Culture Friday to celebrate the 77th founding anniversary of the KPA.
					 It was appreciated by senior party, army and state officials, chairpersons of friendly parties, leading officials of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons and families of KPA servicemen, persons who have distinguished themselves in assisting the army and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Overseas Koreans, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, diplomatic envoys of various countries and members of the military attaches corps here were also among the audience on invitation.
					
					 Put on the stage were mixed chorus "Peerless Patriot General Kim Jong Il", "Always Looking up to the Leader", female solo "Thunder on Jong Il Peak", "General Is Crack Shot and We are Straight Shots," mixed chorus "Song of the Korean People's Army" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the immortal feats performed by President Kim Il Sung who set a brilliant example in building the revolutionary armed forces in the era of independence and provided the glorious history and traditions of the ever-victorious Korean revolution and those performed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has demonstrated all over the world the dignity and national power of the country with arms.

articles.title: Decision Made to Refer U.S. Journalists to Trial
articles.content:
Decision Made to Refer U.S. Journalists to Trial
  Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- A competent organ of the DPRK concluded the investigation into the journalists of the United States.
					 The organ formally decided to refer them to a trial on the basis of the confirmed crimes committed by them.

articles.title: Education Ministry Spokesman Assails Japanese Reactionaries' Distortion of History
articles.content:
Education Ministry Spokesman Assails Japanese Reactionaries' Distortion of History
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries are persisting in their moves to justify the aggression committed by Japan against Korea and its past colonial rule over it and tamper with the history of the Korean nation. This came under fire by a statement issued by a spokesman for the Ministry of Education of the DPRK Friday.
					 It bitterly denounced the remarks made by the Japanese reactionaries to justify Japan's colonial rule over Korea and their moves to tamper with history as an unpardonable criminal act to implant the departed soul of the militarists into the minds of the younger generation and realize their ambition to stage a comeback to Korea without fail.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are leaving no means untried to justify the aggression perpetrated by Japan against Korea throughout its history and its colonial rule over it. These crimes are the height of cunning and shamelessness of samurais keen to cover up the crime-woven past at any cost and a revelation of the Japanese militarists' ambition for reinvasion.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists' aggression against Korea and their colonial rule over it were, indeed, the worst state-sponsored crimes in history. 
					
					 Such criminals dared claim their aggression and colonial rule over Korea were "soft and fair ones" and they "contributed to the modernization" and the like. This is no more than imprudent and brigandish sophism which touches off towering resentment not only among the Koreans but of the international community.
					
					 The Korean nation will settle accounts with Japan for all its past crimes and its moves for confrontation with the DPRK and force it to pay for them a thousand times generation after generation.
					
					 It should never pardon the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors which has connived and defended the moves of the Japanese reactionaries, unhesitatingly letting loose nonsense that "south Korea-Japan relations should not be allowed to retreat due to the issue of understanding history" under the motto of "reconciliation" and "future-oriented attitude."

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Feted
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Feted
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's Ministry of the People's Armed Forces gave a reception for the military attaches corps here on April 23 on the occasion of the 77th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Present there on invitation were members of the corps headed by Miguel Angel Gala Valiente, military attache of the Cuban embassy.
					
					 Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, and general-officers and officers of the KPA were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Il from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Il from Military Attaches Corps
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 77th founding anniversary of the KPA.
					 Miguel Angel Gala Valiente, military attache of the Cuban embassy who is doyen of the corps, handed the basket and letter to an official concerned on April 24.

articles.title: Russian Center Opens
articles.content:
Russian Center Opens
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The Russian Center was opened with due ceremony at Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies Friday.
					 Present at the ceremony were Kim Yong Jin, minister of Education, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and teachers and students of the university. 
					
					 Sergei Viktorovich Lavrov, foreign minister of the Russian Federation, and his party and Valery Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The participants looked round the centre and appreciated an art performance given by students.

articles.title: Symposium in Field of Social Science Held
articles.content:
Symposium in Field of Social Science Held
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- A symposium in the field of social science was held on April 23 to mark the 20th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's visit to the Mausoleum of King Tongmyong.
					 He scientifically ascertained that the mausoleum in Ryongsan-ri, Ryokpho District, Pyongyang was that of King Tongmyong, the founder of Koguryo. He visited it on April 2, Juche 78 (1989) and clearly indicated the orientation and ways for rebuilding it.
					
					 All the parts and facilities of the mausoleum and its surroundings were restored to meet the architectural needs of Koguryo, suited to the stature of its founding father thanks to his noble patriotic intention and wise leadership.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il settled all the problems arising in rebuilding the mausoleum as a treasure of the country in the era of the Workers' Party as planned and intended by Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Presented at the symposium were papers explaining and proving the leadership feats performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in wisely leading the work to successfully rebuild the mausoleum and the position and role of Koguryo in the development of the history of the Korean nation.
					
					Speakers explained and proved the fact that Koguryo demonstrated its might as a sovereign state strong in independence from the very day of its foundation and a power that existed in the East for 1,000 years.
					
					 They also explained the fact that the fame of King Tongmyong was widely known not only in those days but the story about it was subsequently conveyed to the periods of Koryo and Ri Dynasty, making him an object of worship by the feudal ruling class and an ideological and moral icon for maintaining state power.
					
					 They stressed the need to glorify the undying leadership feats performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in preserving the nation's cultural heritages. 
					
					 Present at the symposium were Thae Hyong Chol, president of the Academy of Social Science, and others.

articles.title: 12th Cycle of Judge's Course for IAG Held
articles.content:
12th Cycle of International Judges' Course for IAG Held
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The 12th cycle of international judges' course for international acrobatic gymnastics was held at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium between April 21 and 24.
					The course is attended by five Korean candidates for international judge. And 25 national judges are present there in the observer's capacity.
					
					It dealt with the renewed technical regulations of the FIG, code of points of categories in acrobatic gymnastics and others.

articles.title: Information Services Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Information Services Brisk in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Information services are presenting an animated scene in the DPRK.
					The Grand People's Study House has arranged the server room, the catalog retrieving room, the e-reading room and the multimedia reading room to suit the demands of the new century while digitizing tens of millions of volumes of originals and catalogs. And it is energetically pushing ahead with the work for resolving scientific and technical problems arising in turning the libraries across the country into e-libraries.
					
					Recently, the library managing method institute there wrote and disseminated a lot of books helpful to the management of libraries and organized technical short courses on the spot several times.
					
					The libraries in the provinces, cities and counties (districts) are rendering effective information services to the readers by the Korean-style method of service operation and with modern information facilities. 
					
					In Jagang and South and North Hamgyong Provinces e-service began after the libraries had been face-lifted. 
					
					Work is on the way to modernize the libraries and render high-standard of information services in Hoeryong City, North Hamgyong Province, Mangyongdae District, Pyongyang, Manpho City, Jagang Province, Ongjin County, South Hwanghae Province, Phihyon County, North Phyongan Province, Samjiyon County, Ryanggang Province, Tanchon City, South Hamgyong Province and many other cities and counties (districts).
					
					Working people of all strata and school youth and children find sufficient data available at the e-libraries.

articles.title: Legal protection and Encouragement on Intellectual Properties
articles.content:
Legal protection and Encouragement on Intellectual Properties
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The work of protecting and encouraging the intellectual property rights by law is being done amid the state interest in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The work has it as its basic principle to make a substantial contribution to the economic development of the country and the promotion of the people's welfare in accordance with the intrinsic requirements of the socialist society and is guaranteed thoroughly by the state policy and by laws and regulations related to the intellectual property rights field.
					
					 Having adopted the "Law on Invention of the DPRK", the state gives invention right or patent right to the scientific and technological achievements which can produce new, developed and greater technological and economic results.
					
					 Along with this, the state protects the invention rights and patent rights so that they are ensured strictly and increases constantly the investment needed for encouraging the invention work actively and applying the results to practice.
					
					 The state also adopted laws for the protection of trademark, place name of origin and industrial design to establish a strict system and order in the application of all units for the registration of trademark and place name of origin and their examination. And it lets them constantly renovate the industrial design to suit the developing national economy and the growth of production.
					
					 In accordance with the "Copy-write Law of the DPRK", relevant personal and property rights are given to the citizens who have created various kinds of literary and art pieces, scientific treatises, maps, designs, computer programmes and other creations and editions and all the working people are demanded to strictly adhere to the instituted order in the protection of the copy-write and in the utilization of works. 
					
					 On the occasion of the World Intellectual Property Day Choe Chi Ho, a department director of the State Administration for Quality Management, had this to say at an interview with KCNA: The DPRK has enacted and promulgated new laws and regulations related to the intellectual property rights and amended and supplemented them in recent years. It is thus developing in a go-ahead way the work of laying a firm guarantee for raising the social understanding of the intellectual property rights and carrying out scientific enterprise strategy, operation strategy.
					
					 Colorful activities such as exhibition, seminar and short-course will take place in the DPRK according to the theme "Green Innovation" for this year advanced by the World Intellectual Property Organization.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers' Moves for War against DPRK Flayed
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers' Moves for War against DPRK Flayed
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the commander of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces present in south Korea flew aboard a fighter of the south Korean air force while a brasshat of the puppet military who is deputy commander of the south Korea-U.S. "combined forces command" made a similar flight aboard a fighter of the U.S. air force for the purpose of examining the "posture of air operation and capability carrying out a combined operation."    Commenting on the "exchange of flights," Minju Joson Friday observes that it was aimed to examine, supplement and round off the preparations for a war of aggression against the DPRK they have pushed forward so far. 
					 The news analyst goes on:
					
					The situation on the Korean Peninsula has become so tense that a war may break out any moment. But the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers do not hide their sinister intention to put spurs to the above-said preparations under the pretext of "alliance," while getting on the nerves of the army and the people of the DPRK. 
					
					 If the DPRK remains a passive onlooker to the moves of war against it pursued by the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group under the pretext of "alliance," it will be as clear as noonday that the whole land of Korea will turn into a theatre of a nuclear war and all Koreans in the north and the south will have to suffer a nuclear holocaust. 
					
					  The U.S. and the south Korean warmongers are working hard to dare invade the DPRK while talking about the "tightened alliance," but it is a daydream. 
					
					 The revolutionary powerful forces of Mt. Paektu which have grown to be invincible under the care of the Songun brilliant commander accurately target the U.S., the south Korean warmongers and other forces hostile to the DPRK.
					
					 If the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers start a new war, a nuclear war at any cost on the Korean Peninsula under the pretext of "alliance" targeted against the DPRK, the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will deal unpredictable, inescapable and merciless blows at them. 
					
					 They would be well advised to bear this in mind, scrap the "war alliance" aimed at invading the DPRK and drop provocative hostile acts against its army and the people.

articles.title: Dynamic Struggle against Imperialists' Psychological Warfare Called for
articles.content:
Dynamic Struggle against Imperialists' Psychological Warfare Called for
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The psychological warfare of the imperialists is like a hidden dagger for isolating and stifling the anti-imperialist independent countries and seeking their regime changes and bringing down their systems. Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed article. 
					 It goes on: 
					
					 The imperialists prefer a psychological warfare in the standoff with the anti-imperialist independent countries as they think it is several times more effective than rifle bullets and bombs. 
					
					 The article cites facts to prove that the imperialists, who have precedents of craftily using modern propaganda means for creating illusion and fear of them in the period of Cold War, set up lots of diverse machines for the psychological warfare and invested huge funds in them after the demise of the Cold War. 
					
					 What happened in those countries that fell victim to the psychological warfare of the imperialists in recent years proves that if countries fail to maintain vigilance against the warfare, they cannot protect the sovereignty of the countries and nations. 
					
					 The imperialists' of aggressive and hegemonic nature will and can never change. What they seek is to infringe upon the sovereignty of other countries and nations and establish world domination.
					
					 The revolutionary parties and peoples should see through vulnerability of imperialism and fight against it with a tough stand. 
					
					 Now the imperialists intensify their horror operation and blackmailing offensive by force of arms it is of particular importance to build up one's own military muscle. 
					
					 The revolutionary parties and peoples should intensify the struggle against the psychological warfare, bearing in mind that it is one of the important ways for protecting the sovereignty of the country and the nation, human cause of independence, socialism and precipitating the final doom of imperialism to foil the nasty and vicious psychological warfare of the imperialists.

articles.title: Implementation of Three Charters for National Reunification Called for
articles.content:
Implementation of Three Charters for National Reunification Called for 
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The three charters for national reunification are guidelines which all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should invariably hold fast to till the victory of the cause of national reunification is achieved, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a signed article.
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il formulated the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme for the great unity of the entire nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo initiated by President Kim Il Sung as three charters for national reunification.
					
					 The three principles -- independence, peaceful reunification and the great national unity -- clarify the fundamental stand and ways for solving the reunification issue of the country by the efforts of the Koreans themselves as desired by the nation and in its interests.
					
					 The ten-point programme which clarifies the establishment of an independent, peaceful and neutral unified state as the final goal of the great national unity defines patriotism and the spirit of national independence as an ideological groundwork for unity and the promotion of co-existence, co-prosperity and common interests between the north and the south as a basic principle of unity.
					
					 The proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo indicates a basic way for reunifying the country without any deviation on the basis of the north and the south recognizing and tolerating each other's ideologies and systems.
					
					 It is thanks to the three charters, guidelines for national reunification movement, that the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it, were provided and the new historic era for achieving independent reunification by the concerted efforts of the Koreans was ushered in.
					
					 The fundamental problems for solving the issue of the destiny of the nation, the reunification issue by the concerted efforts of the Koreans explained in the three charters are clarified in the north-south joint declarations.
					
					 The struggle to implement the inter-Korean declarations is precisely the struggle to implement the three charters for national reunification. The implementation of the declarations guarantees national independence and the country's reunification.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should pool their strength and achieve the cause of independent reunification without fail under the uplifted banner of the three charters for national reunification and the inter-Korean joint declarations, its embodiment.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Revolutionary Comradeship
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Revolutionary Comradeship
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Revolutionary Comradeship Is the Foundation of the Single-minded Unity and an Engine of Our Revolution" serves as an immortal banner for giving steady continuity to the lifeline of the Korean revolution and more dynamically advancing the socialist cause of Juche with the might of the single-minded unity based on the revolutionary comradeship.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes this in a signed article:
					
					 The work fully reflects Kim Jong Il's ardent revolutionary comradeship and his iron will to accomplish with comradeship the revolutionary cause of Juche started with it. 
					
					 The history of the Korean revolution is a history of revolutionary comradeship and the revolutionary comradeship serves as the mental power of the Workers' Party of Korea and a powerful driving force of the revolution. 
					
					 The revolutionary comradeship means a foundation for training the army and the people into the fighters devotedly defending the headquarters of the revolution and an ideological and moral source for consolidating the great army-people unity in every way, the unity stronger than a nuclear weapon, and a powerful driving force for bringing about a great leap forward in building a great prosperous powerful nation by giving full play to the mental power of the masses. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il always visits soldiers and people despite rain or snow, prompted by his creed that he can live thanks to comrades and his existence would be unthinkable without comrades. His comradeship has served as a powerful weapon for giving play to the inexhaustible power and a source that helped train a large contingent of Songun revolutionary comrades who share idea and intention and destiny with the headquarters of the revolution. 
					
					 The revolutionary ranks in the DPRK advancing under the banner of the great Songun have grown to be the ranks of single-minded unity based on one idea and faith, comradeship and sense of obligation. 
					
					 The field guidance provided by him to various fields of the national economy across the country as a forced march day and night encourages all the servicepersons and people to give full play to their patriotic enthusiasm and fully demonstrate popular heroism on all fronts for building a thriving nation. 
					
					 Victory is always in store for the ongoing general advance as all the people are waging a dynamic drive, inspired by his warm comradeship and trust.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves for Obstructing Liquidation of Past History Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves for Obstructing Liquidation of Past History Assailed
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The All-People Committee for Proper Settlement of Past in south Korea released a statement on April 20 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group's personnel reshuffle.
					 Recalling that the Lee Myung Bak "government" and the "Grand National Party" appointed their confidants as non-permanent members of the Committee for Settling the Past History for Truth and Reconciliation, the statement branded them as traitors who have taken the lead in the moves to distort history while committing all sorts of irregularities and corruption.
					
					 Terming the above-said action taken by the "government" and the GNP a base behavior to obstruct the liquidation of the past history, the statement demanded that the crimes committed by the dictators and traitors in the past be probed without fail.

articles.title: Puppet Authorities' Unreasonable Behavior Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Puppet Authorities' Unreasonable Behavior Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Seoul Central District Court on April 21 designated the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration as an "enemy-benefiting organization ", according to MBC of south Korea.
					 At a trial that day the group of traitors sentenced prison terms to four hardcore members of the solidarity, claiming that it is a "dangerous organization benefiting the enemy".
					
					 In this connection civic and public organizations held a press conference in front of the court and protested against the unreasonable behavior of the puppet authorities.
					
					 In a press release the organizations said that such behavior fully revealed that the case of the solidarity was faked up by the security authorities pursuant to the Lee Myung Bak regime's confrontational policy.
					
					 The definition of the solidarity as an "enemy-benefiting organization" is little short of labeling the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration as "benefiting the enemy", the organizations said, calling for struggling in firm unity till all the detainees are set free.
					
					 They stressed that they would appeal against the suppression of the solidarity.

articles.title: Movement for Punishing Traitor Lee Myung Bak Called for
articles.content:
Movement for Punishing Traitor Lee Myung Bak Called for
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Federation of University Students in the 21st Century held a meeting in Seoul on April 18 at which it called upon the students to turn out in the struggle for eliminating the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors.
					 The university students are now in the grip of uneasiness, left without any hope for the future due to the issue of skyrocketing registration fee and the daily worsening issue of young unemployed, the organization said, adding that this is attributable to the Lee "government" which unilaterally imposes the pain resulting from the economic crisis upon the people.
					
					 There is no future for the university students unless they punish the Lee regime, it noted, declaring that they would join the workers in waging a struggle to punish the Lee regime with May Day as a momentum.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Antonio Neto, chairman of the Brazilian Working People's General Center who is vice-president of the World Federation of Trade Unions, issued a statement on April 10 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The statement noted that Kim Il Sung had wisely led the socialist revolution and construction in the DPRK until the last moments of his life.
					
					 It further said: The President embarked on the road of revolution in his early years and defeated the Japanese imperialists in his thirties. He led the 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S. imperialists to victory and, afterwards, turned the DPRK into a socialist state independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence, smashing every machination of the imperialists.
					
					The statement said that General Secretary Kim Jong Il is now wisely leading the Korean people's struggle to frustrate the U.S.-led imperialists' provocations and threat.
					
					 It noted with high appreciation that the Korean people successfully launched its satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 by the strength of self-reliance, thus demonstrating to the whole world the nation's level of scientific and technological development.

articles.title: Seminars Held to Commemorate Day of Sun
articles.content:
Seminars Held to Commemorate Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Seminars on exploits of President Kim Il Sung took place in Cambodia, Italy and Thailand between April 7 and 9 on the occasion of the anniversary of his birth.
					 Displayed in the venues of the seminars were famous works of the peerlessly great persons and photos showing their undying feats and books and pictures introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 The deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace of Cambodia said that Kim Il Sung, eternal President of the DPRK, is the benefactor and the closest friend of the Cambodian people.
					
					 Saying that the DPRK has achieved many successes in building a great prosperous and powerful nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, he stressed that the successful satellite launch by the DPRK was a demonstration of its dignity and economic, scientific and technological potentials.
					
					 The general secretary of the Struggle for the Peace and Socialism of Italy noted that the successful satellite launch, another great achievement made by the Korean people in building a great prosperous and powerful nation, is a significant and auspicious, historic event common to the world progressive people.
					
					 He said that the Korean people are confidently advancing while working new miracles thanks to the Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung and the solid foundation of the independent national economy laid by him and the great Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Egypt
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Egypt
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is the Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" was brought out in pamphlet by the Dar Al-Shaab Publishing House of Egypt on April 15.
					 The work, published on September 5, Juche 97 (2008), describes the six decades of the DPRK as a history of great struggle and victory, creation and changes in which it defended the independence and honor of the country and built a prospering socialist country, pulling through the storm of revolution under the leadership of the great leader and the great party and clarifies the idea that when its leader and party are great, even a small and backward country can be turned into a developed country and an authoritative powerful country.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks and ways for finally accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche under the banner of the Juche idea, the banner of Songun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe regalo del canciller ruso
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe regalo del canciller ruso
Pyongyang, 24 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio presente que le dirigiera el canciller ruso Serguei Viktorovich Lavrov, de visita en Corea.
					  El visitante lo entrego el dia 24 al presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Kim Yong Nam.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX se refiere a la visita del canciller ruso a Corea
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX se refiere a la visita del canciller ruso a Corea
Pyongyang, 24 de abril (ATCC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea formulada en relacion con la visita del canciller ruso a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC respondio el dia 24 como lo siguiente:
					  El canciller ruso y su comitiva visitaron los dias 23 y 24 a la RPDC como parte del intercambio para conmemorar significativamente este ano, en que se cumple el 60o aniversario de la concertacion del Tratado sobre la cooperacion economica y cultural Corea-Rusia, segun el acuerdo alcanzado a finales del ano pasado entre las cancillerias de ambos paises.
					
					 Durante su visita, el canciller ruso realizo una visita de cortesia al presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y sostuvo conversaciones con su homologo coreano.
					
					 En las ocasiones fueron debatidos los problemas para ampliar y desarrollar las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea y Rusia.
					
					 En las conversaciones fue discutida tambien la situacion dada por la publicacion de la "declaracion presidencial" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU que censuro el lanzamiento de satelite artificial realizado por nuestro pais para fines pacificos.
					
					 Ambas partes reconocieron que el lanzamiento de satelite artificial es un derecho soberano de cada pais.
					
					 La parte rusa ratifico su posicion de rechazar la sancion de la ONU contra la RPDC y tomo en consideracion la posicion de nuestra parte de que no se necesitan por mas tiempo las conversaciones a 6 bandas.

articles.title: Plan de intercambio cultural y cientifico entre Corea y Rusia
articles.content:
Plan de intercambio cultural y cientifico entre Corea y Rusia
Pyongyang, 24 de abril (ATCC) -- Quedo rubricado el dia 23 en esta capital el plan de intercambio cultural y cientifico para 2009-2010 entre los gobiernos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y de la Federacion Rusa.
					 En la ceremonia de firmas participaron por la parte coreana el presidente interino del Comite de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, Mun Jae Chol, y otros funcionarios y, por la rusa, el canciller ruso Serguei Viktorovich Lavrov y su comitiva y el embajador de Rusia en Corea, Valery Sukhinin. 
					
					 Lo firmaron Mun Jae Chol y Serguei Viktorovich Lavrov.

articles.title: Acto central por el 77o aniversario de la fundacion del EPC
articles.content:
Acto central por el 77o aniversario de la fundacion del EPC
Pyongyang, 24 de abril (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar este viernes en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 77o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea (EPC).
					  Al conclave asistieron los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, los presidentes de partidos amigos, los funcionarios de los organos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las organizaciones sociales, ministerios e instituciones centrales, oficiales y soldados del EPC, los funcionarios de los dominios de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los familiares de  los militares en servicio, los benemeritos en la asistencia al ejercito y trabajadores capitalinos. 
					
					  Tambien, estuvieron presentes los coreanos residentes en ultramar y el representante de la Sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					  Ademas, fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises y los miembros del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares, acreditados en Corea.
					
					  El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del general de ejercito Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC.
					
					  El Presidente Kim Il Sung fundo el 25 de abril del 21 (1932) de la Era Juche el Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea dando inicio a la nueva historia de la revolucion coreana que se forjo, triunfa y avanza apoyandose en las fuerzas armadas, comenzo el orador y continuo:
					
					  Las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de Corea lograron victorias derrotando a las dos fuerzas agresoras imperialistas en la guerra revolucionaria antijaponesa y la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria que se libraron en el siglo pasado.
					
					  El EPC, fortalecido como fuerzas armadas revolucionarias capaces de pelear a solas contra cien enemigos bajo la sabia direccion del partido y el lider, vino garantizando con las armas el avance victorioso de la causa revolucionaria del Juche destruyendo a cada paso en la primera linea del frente militar antiimperialista las incesantes maniobras de provocacion de guerra de los imperialistas norteamericanos y sus lacayos y defendiendo firmemente la seguridad del pais y las conquistas del socialismo.
					
					  La politica de Songun (priorizacion militar) del Partido del Trabajo de Corea consiste en desarrollar de manera revolucionaria y combativa todas las labores de la revolucion y la construccion presentando el asunto militar como primera labor estatal y tomando al EPC como fuerza medular y grueso. He aqui precisamente la originalidad y el poderio invencible de la politica de Songun.
					
					  Hoy, el EPC, que crecio como poderosas fuerzas armadas revolucionarias dispuestas de todos los medios modernos para el ataque y la defensa capaces de frustrar de un golpe cualquier invasion armada de los enemigos, logra triunfos prodigiosos en el enconado enfrentamiento antiimperialista y anti-EE.UU. y la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea muestra su gallardo aspecto de potencia militar de talla mundial que posee el disuasivo de guerra de caracter autodefensivo. Esto es el precioso resultado de la destacada y probada direccion del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Il.
					
					  Todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los habitantes deben defender en lo politico e ideologico y a costa de la vida al Dirigente Kim Jong Il en cualesquier vicisitudes y consolidar ferreamente la unidad monolitica entre el partido, el ejercito y el pueblo cuyo centro es la Direccion de la Revolucion.
					
					Hay que establecer estrictamente el sistema de mando militar y el estilo militar revolucionarios, segun los cuales todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC se mueven unanimemente a la orden del Comandante Supremo.
					
					  Es preciso seguir realizando ingentes esfuerzos por el desarrollo de la industria de defensa nacional segun la demanda de la linea de la construccion economica socialista de la epoca del Songun en el principio de dar prioridad a los asuntos militares, realizar en un nivel mas alto la modernizacion de todo el ejercito y el armamento de todo el pueblo y convertir todo el pais en un baluarte inexpugnable.
					
					  Dado que continuan la politica hostil y las maniobras agresivas de los yanquis y los titeres surcoreanos contra la RPDC, fortaleceremos mas y mas el disuasivo de guerra para defender la dignidad del pais y el derecho a la existencia de la nacion y tomaremos las contramedidas mas duras.
					
					  Si las fuerzas belicistas de EE.UU. y la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak se atreven a desatar la guerra de agresion pese a las reiteradas advertencias nuestras, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea les responderan con la gran guerra de reunificacion justa rotunda e implacable, exterminaran a los agresores usando toda la potencialidad militar y cumpliran sin  falta la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria.
